title: Obari
author: Obari
created_time: February 11, 2023, 07:30:41 AMLast edit: February 12, 2023, 11:23:55 AM by Obari
content: Im not really a political fan but I've been following the political threads of rivers state and the crisis so far.It also seems that the rivers state governor is yet to declare the candidate of his choice and I've been wanting to know if there is any hope for pdp this election as I also heard that the PDP governorship candidate has been disqualified but yet still campaigned yesterday at the eleme mega rally.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Politics too get wahala. River State na pdp state so i feel and know say na still pdp go win because wike no fit allow apc come take the state even if e wan comot as governor. I go use watin happen for my own state cite example, for the first time for years the masses came out and voted for a totally different person not because of party but his personality as a philanthropist and eventually he won and he was part of the opposite party (Apc) so the current government twisted the whole situation and turn things against him and disqualified him as the governor. This thing cause so many problems for my state because everyone voted and loved the apc candidate  but politicians and their game no allow am rule.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on February 11, 2023, 11:59:12 AMPolitics too get wahala. River State na pdp state so i feel and know say na still pdp go win because wike no fit allow apc come take the state even if e wan comot as governor. I go use watin happen for my own state cite example, for the first time for years the masses came out and voted for a totally different person not because of party but his personality as a philanthropist and eventually he won and he was part of the opposite party (Apc) so the current government twisted the whole situation and turn things against him and disqualified him as the governor. This thing cause so many problems for my state because everyone voted and loved the apc candidate  but politicians and their game no allow am rule. From your citation, I guess you are talking about David Lyon of APC.  It is unfortunate that the electorate could not resist them because of the Powers that be, they arm twisted everything against the masses that voted him into power and nothing could be don about it. This is the case of Nigeria politics where the elites do whatever they feel like doing and getting away with it while the people sit, fold their arms and watch doing nothing to protect their mandate. Back to Rivers State, I think this time around it would not be game as usual, the electorates are wiser and can not be deceived anymore. I know they would bring money, they would share money but this time around it will be shared in vain and they would fail woefully.  The issue of retaining the state under one party system is not feasible anymore I think because gone are the days when the people are blinded with one party system but now, it is personality, what are your past track records, what have you been able to do before. All these would definitely speak for each and every one contender come 2023 gubernatorial election.

comments.body: OP me too no get love for politics but as Rivers State dy like this I no think say some kind suffer suppose dy follow for the citizens body especially now wey to even use our moni be d major problem, instead of our big man wey be the strong govoh to use him power to give order say make nobody reject old moni so that e no go hard us all till this old moni comot on em own but nothing like that at all, chai na wa. And again some okoko piple see the situation of things con decide to cos kasala for the State bcos of rally or say election don dy reach, well, lme I no get strength to go dy put eyes where e no go benefit me at all and I no even surprise say things like this dy happen for this State.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: From my own perspective, I see this as a political strategy to decieve the people as if they are having issues between themselves which might turn up to be a lie. In secretes they dine and wine together and laugh at the masses that took their media speech serious. Naija you need to use your head reason these politicians, if not them go use your head play their useless games. Nwike knows deep down in him that he is a PDP member but he is angry over his party decisions on picking their heads. All of them na their belle make them dey do anyhow becos say election don reach and who no follow,no go benefit.
